casebody.data:
Constantin SELETSKY, Plaintiff in Error, v. Platon RODJESTVENSKY, Archbishop of the Russian Orthodox Greek Catholic Church of America, and North American Ecclesiastical Consistory of the Russian Orthodox Greek Catholic Church, Defendants in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 5, 1927. No. 70. Henry L. Slobodin, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. George Gray Zabriskie, of New York City (Leonard P. Moore, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error Rodjestvensky.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
